title: Easy and Delicious Purple Yam (Ube) Cookies
ingredients: ⅓ cup purple yam powder, or more to taste
method: Step 1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or grease lightly.

Step 2: Mix sugar, oil, eggs, vanilla extract, salt, baking powder, purple yam powder, and flour, in this order, in a large bowl until dough is well blended. Drop tablespoons of dough onto the baking sheet.
Step 3: Bake in the preheated oven until cookies look firm, 8 to 10 minutes. Cool for at least 5 minutes before gently transferring to a wire rack.

Step 4: To test your batter, drop a tablespoon of the batter into a microwaveable mug and add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water and mix until it resembles cake batter. Microwave for a minute or two until cooked.
